```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

* Point your browser to [https://github.com/STAT-ATA-ASU](https://github.com/STAT-ATA-ASU)

* Find your repository

* Click the `Clone or download` button

* Clone with https - copy the address to the clipboard

* Open the RStudio IDE

* Click the `New Project` icon

* Select `New Project > Version Control > Git`

* Paste the information on the clipboard in the `Repository URL` box

* In the `Project directory name` box paste the last bit of information on the clipboard without the `*.git`

* In the `Create project as a subdirectory of:` box select where you want the repository to be stored.
